TopicTitle: KOSSTORE - a global directory of K-OS scripts

Articles.Content:
In the interest of making a place to view, discuss and create scripts for K-OS (a scriptable autopilot mod for ksp) I've created http://Kosstore.com, a data store for k-OS.

By all means it is a work in progress. Please feel free to ask any questions or make suggestions here and I'll answer them (or implement them).

We are also working to get integration with the IDE available in the spaceport and maybe even someday have it available as a secondary archive in ksp itself.
